post.body: SOUP + bread and salad = giant meal for CHEEEEEEEAP.
That hospital creeps me the fuck out. Also, tell me moar about your new toy!!
Yep, I got mine from the reject shop. Also, when in doubt, check ikea hacker for inspiration.
I have an ex-office table from a corp clearance and use that combined w/ some cheap cube bookcases. Not v schmick but functional
When I'm this low on groceries, I seriously thought about keeping them for a minute... :P
Dear Santa - please bring me this for the lulz: http://www.atlasbooks.com/marktplc/02503.htm
IKEA, oh how I love you. Especially when I walk out with many goods at a total cost of under $100.
I am sick of patronising douchebags. I also feel like swearing a hell of a lot more, but I'll spare you. /grumpy-pants
Epic win or epically disturbing? http://tinyurl.com/6hdrjt
Ooooh man, too many humans are giving me the royal shits today. Must. resist. urge. to. kill. them.
http://tinyurl.com/57olf7 WTF?
I have teh insomnia.
Does this mean Rule 34 of the Internet is now illegal? I'm all confused.
http://tinyurl.com/5sp8sp
About bloody time: http://tinyurl.com/5utqn6
sexy barrel clooney fish
The reality of moving is starting to sink in. Fuck, there's way too much to do.
Crisis averted. Want sleep now.
Why do I have the feeling we're about to have a fight over dumb shit that is none of his bloody business??
Child is possibly the silliest nearly 20-month old on the planet. She keeps sticking a cap to her chin and making duck sounds...
Back online in a day or so. Need to sort out my head.
Child has found a brilliant storage place for her cornflakes - in her navel. o_0
Oooh, man. The Holiday Homesickness has begun. You'd think after all these years, I'd be used to a summer xmas, but I'm not. I WANT SNOW!
Headache of DOOM!
http://tinyurl.com/4f559p This gave me goosebumps.
Copying selected IAM entries into my neglected Wordpress blog as I guess I really should have a public, easily accessible web presence.
